EmailTemplate.name: Sept18Web:Proposals.Reminder Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: 4 Keys to Win New Business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
We would like to remind you that you can join us Tuesday, September 18 at 1pm EST for our free webinar: Win New Consulting Business: The Four Keys to Writing a Successful Proposal <http://info.mbopartners.com/Sept18WebProposals.html>.
In this free webinar, prominent proposal writer Tom Sant, whom the American Management Association calls, “America’s foremost practitioner of proposal writing," will teach you four keys to make your proposal stand out— and win the contract.
Grow your business by registering <http://info.mbopartners.com/Sept18WebProposals.html> today.
___________________________________ MBO Partners t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com>
